pi2en-glossary._id: brahmacariya-Note: use spirit and its derivatives for Brahma whenever possible. This not only allows for modern sounding language, but spirit is probably the closest thing to the original meaning of brahma, as the spirit, magic essence, vitality or living field of growth in nature
